Title: Enacts the "New York State pedestrian right-of-way protection act"
Summary: Enacts the "New York State pedestrian right-of-way protection act" which makes it an unclassified misdemeanor to stop, stand or park a vehicle in a pedestrian right-of-way.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to enacting the "New York State pedestrian right-of-way protection act"
